custom-sql.sql: SELECT lar.* FROM lms_learningactivityresult lar INNER JOIN lms_learningactivity la ON lar.actId = la.actId WHERE la.required = true AND la.groupId = ? AND lar.userId = ?
SELECT COUNT(lar.actId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM lms_learningactivityresult lar INNER JOIN lms_learningactivity la ON lar.actId = la.actId WHERE la.required = true AND la.moduleId = ? AND lar.userId = ?

SELECT COUNT(1) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM lms_learningactivityresult lar LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ugrT ON lar.userId = ugrT.userId AND ugrT.roleId = ? AND ugrT.groupId = lar.groupId LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ugrE ON lar.userId = ugrE.userId AND ugrE.roleId = ? AND ugrE.groupId = lar.groupId WHERE lar.actId = ? AND lar.endDate IS NOT NULL AND ugrT.userId IS NULL AND ugrE.userId IS NULL;
